definition: the act of moving forward (as toward a goal)
details:
noun
- the act of moving forward (as toward a goal)
= synonyms: advancement
- the group action of a collection of people or animals or vehicles moving ahead in more or less regular formation
= example: the group action of a collection of people or animals or vehicles moving ahead in more or less regular formation
- (theology) the origination of the Holy Spirit at Pentecost
= synonyms: rise, emanation
